tool_description: The UK Geo API is a RESTful web service that provides various endpoints for retrieving geographical information and performing location-based operations within the United Kingdom. It leverages open-source data and external APIs to deliver accurate and up-to-date location-related functionalities.
name: The UK Geo API
title: The UK Geo API

api_list.name: Directions
api_list.description: Retrieves directions and route information between two locations specified by their latitude and longitude coordinates.

required_parameters.name: start_lon
required_parameters.description: The longitude coordinate of the starting location.

required_parameters.name: end_lon
required_parameters.description: The longitude coordinate of the destination location.

required_parameters.name: start_lat
required_parameters.description: The latitude coordinate of the starting location.

required_parameters.name: end_lat
required_parameters.description: The latitude coordinate of the destination location.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of distance measurement ("**km**" for kilometers, "**mi**" for miles).

api_list.name: Calculate Distance Reverse
api_list.description: Calculates the distance and duration between two locations using their start and stop addresses within the UK.

required_parameters.name: stop_address
required_parameters.description: The address of the destination location.

required_parameters.name: start_address
required_parameters.description: The address of the starting location.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of distance measurement ("**km**" for kilometers, "**mi**" for miles, "**ft**" for feet, "**yd**" for yards).

api_list.name: Calculate Distance
api_list.description: Calculates the distance and duration between two locations specified by their latitude and longitude coordinates.

required_parameters.name: lon2
required_parameters.description: The longitude coordinate of the destination location.

required_parameters.name: lat2
required_parameters.description: The latitude coordinate of the destination location.

required_parameters.name: lon1
required_parameters.description: The longitude coordinate of the starting location.

required_parameters.name: lat1
required_parameters.description: The latitude coordinate of the starting location.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of distance measurement ("**km**" for kilometers, "**mi**" for miles, "**ft**" for feet, "**yd**" for yards).

api_list.name: Geocode Reverse
api_list.description: Retrieves the reverse geocoding information for a given latitude and longitude within the UK.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of facilities in the UK based on the provided facility name and optional pagination.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name of the facility to search for.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of facilities to retrieve.

api_list.name: Facilities Lookup
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of facilities in the UK based on the provided facility type and optional filters such as state and city.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of facility to search for (e.g., hospital, bank, restaurant, etc..).

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of facilities to retrieve.

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: The country within the UK to filter the facilities.

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: The city within the UK to filter the facilities.

api_list.name: Geocode
api_list.description: Retrieves the latitude, longitude, and display name of a location in the UK based on the provided address.
